description:
[h2]One of the GREATEST Computer Mods out there![/h2]

[hr][/hr]
ScrapComputers is an awesome Computer mod for Scrap Mechanic. There are so many possibilities that you can't even think of! Want to emulate a MOS 6502 CPU? You can do that! Create a Piston Engine Dyno? Why not!

[b]Benefits of using our Computer Mod over others:[/b]
[list]
  [*]Easy-To-Use Interface.
  [*]Everything is documented. (Everything!)
  [*]Best Display Optimization out there.
  [*]Fast Lua Virtual Machine (Custom LuaVM)
[/list]

[b][url=https://scrapcomputers.dev/]Documentation Website[/url][/b]

[quote] If you have spotted any bugs in ScrapComputers, please report it in the comments or in this [url=https://discord.gg/6r46PkYr9s] Discord Server[/url]. Thank you![/quote]
name: ScrapComputers
